skillTalents.name: Guhua Kiếm Đơn - Fatal Rainscreen
skillTalents.description:
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his Kiếm Đơn, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Kiếm Đơns, which will orbit the character.

The Rain Kiếm Đơns have the following properties:

When a character takes DMG, the Rain Kiếm Đơn will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
Increases the character's resistance to interruption.

20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Kiếm Đơns.
The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.

The initial maximum number of Rain Kiếm Đơns is 3.

Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character.

skillTalents.name: Guhua Kiếm Đơn - Raincutter
skillTalents.description:
Initiate RainCung Bladework and fight using an illusory Kiếm Đơn rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Kiếm Đơns.
RainCung Bladework

Tấn công thườngs will trigger consecutive Kiếm Đơn rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG.
Rain Kiếm Đơns will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's Thời Gian Kéo Dài.

These effects carry over to other characters.

passiveTalents.name: Hydropathic
passiveTalents.description: When a Rain Kiếm Đơn is shattered or when its Thời Gian Kéo Dài expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

passiveTalents.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
passiveTalents.description: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.

passiveTalents.name: Flash of Genius
passiveTalents.description: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
